column5: I have to admit that I get hypnotized when watching them in my back yard.  Seeing them pair up,gathering sticks and twigs,building nests in my cedar hedges. Every year-same thing.Maybe even same birds-who knows? The 2 doves got harrassed out by squirrels last year. I felt bad. Sometimes I try and help in a subtle way-but never touch them. Lots of activity today. Fishing soon........
Trouting this weekend Darren? It's open NOW!
